casebody.data:
Fourth Department,

January, 1975

(January 9, 1975) Regina Pruchnowski, as Mother and Natural Guardian of Ann M. Pruchnowski, et al., Appellants, v. Exchange Mutual Insurance Company, Respondent.

Judgment unanimously affirmed, without costs, upon the opinion at Supreme Court, Erie County, Kramer, J. (Appeal from part of judgment of Erie Trial Term in declaratory judgment action on insurance policy.) Present —-Marsh, P. J., Moule, Mahoney, Goldman and Del Vecchio, JJ.
